smtools.swing.dialogs

Enum JTimeChooser.EClockDigits

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<JTimeChooser.EClockDigits>
      • smtools.swing.dialogs.JTimeChooser.EClockDigits
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<JTimeChooser.EClockDigits>
    Enclosing class:
    JTimeChooser

    public static enum JTimeChooser.EClockDigits
extends java.lang.Enum<JTimeChooser.EClockDigits>
    Useful constants to specify that the clock's digits should always be numbered from 1 to 12, or from 1 to 12 in the AM, and from 13 to 24 in the PM
